meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Vinayak Thiagarajan Katy Stigers Dan McShane Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6288.

td.p: Vinayak Thiagarajan, a strategy consultant from Chicago, Illinois
Katy Stigers, a college soccer coach from Bristol, Tennessee
Dan McShane, a baseball game logger from West Islip, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $40,401)

tr.td: ART & ARTISTS
TRAVEL
CELEBRITIES' MIDDLE NAMES
CATHOLIC PRIESTS
TITLE 9
COME "IN"

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
